title: SIM: Media Strategy for a Digital Economy
description: With the explosion in media channels and formats, importance of Media in the Marketing Mix has been on a rapid ascent for the past two decades. Infusion of latest communication technologies has made media the most dynamic part of the marketing world. Estimated 2019 Worldwide media spends, were upwards of US$650Billion, 50% on digital platforms. With CoVID accelerating move to a digital economy, understanding media and related technology has become an imperative. Apart from students targeting careers in Sales, Marketing or Media, the course will be relevant for those targeting careers in start-ups, finance and consultancies.
preclusion: MKT4761C SIM: Media Strategy for a Digital Economy
